articles.description: TimTheTatman left Twitch for YouTube Gaming and shared a wholehearted message for Dr Disrespect. The two were also joined by DrLupo and CouRage in the streets of Verdansk.
articles.content:
TimTheTatman was finally reunited with his partner in crime, Dr Disrespect, when he jumped ship to YouTube Gaming.
As expected, the duo took to the streets of Verdansk and were joined by Jack "CouRa… [+1863 chars]
